```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r cars}
penguins <- read_csv("~/Documents/GitHub/assignment2-AS/penguins.csv")

stats <- penguins %>%
  summarise(max_acceptance = max(bill_length_mm, na.rm = TRUE),
          mean_acceptance = mean(bill_length_mm, na.rm = TRUE))
print(stats)

penguinplot <- ggplot(data=penguins) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(x=island, y=body_mass_g))+
  labs(title = "Body Mass of Penguins by Island",x= "Island",y ="Body Mass (g)")
print(penguinplot)
```
